overview: The inhabitants of Planet Areola are quickly becoming extinct, and one Earth penis could save them all.  Not just any penis - a perfect penis.  Experimentation with an imperfect penis WILL result in deadly tit-lasers.  With  Areola's impending doom Captain Sherdian knew she must send Jessie Lee to complete this mission.  Why Jessie?  ...Well, because she likes dick a lot.
title: Killer Kleavage from Outer Space
